title: Prince George can’t contain his excitement at first Aston Villa game
text:
Prince George jumped up and down at the Aston Villa game (Picture: Getty/ PA)

Prince George was spotted punching the air today as he enjoyed his first ever Aston Villa match.

The young royal, six, watched his team take on Norwich City at Carrow Road, alongside his parents, Prince William and Kate, and younger sister Princess Charlotte, four.

Displaying his support in a claret t-shirt, he could barely contain his excitement as they went on to win the away game 5-1.

Clips of George shared online showed him jumping up and down in his seat and throwing his hands into the air with joy.

His name soon started trending on social media, with some joking that the excitement had even become ‘too much’ for him, as he was filmed screaming and clapping his hands together.

He has followed in his father’s footsteps with his love for the club (Picture: Getty Images)

The family are clearly Aston Villa’s lucky charm (Picture: Rex Features)

The Duke of Cambridge has been a long-time support of Aston Villa and is a regular in the stands at Villa Park.

Earlier this year he was pictured cheering on the side in the Championship Play-Off Final at Wembley.

When George was a toddler, William revealed that he would ‘love’ to attend football matches with his son, but said he would need to ‘pass that by the missus’.

He added that it would ‘fantastic’ if the future-king decided to follow the club, before joking that it would ‘probably end up being that Charlotte is the Villa fan’.

Kate and Prince William treated their children to the match (Picture: Getty Images)

After their victory against Norwich today, Villa manager Dean Smith said the royals were clearly the team’s lucky charm.

He told BBC’s Match of the Day: ‘I’ll be getting them tickets for every game now if they need tickets because, you know, we got the result today.

‘I’ll even put a call in and see if I can get them on the team coach next game.’

Aston Villa’s Twitter account also commented on the royal presence at the game, writing: ‘You know how to pick your #AVFC games, Your Royal Highness.’

description: Prince William and Kate took Prince George and Princess Charlotte to watch Aston Villa play Norwich City today.
